com.buession.redis.client.connection.datasource.jedis

类 JedisDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buession.redis.client.connection.datasource.AbstractDataSource
      • com.buession.redis.client.connection.datasource.jedis.AbstractJedisDataSource
        • com.buession.redis.client.connection.datasource.jedis.JedisDataSource
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DataSource, JedisRedisDataSource, StandaloneDataSource

    public class JedisDataSource
extends AbstractJedisDataSource
implements StandaloneDataSource
    Jedis 单机模式数据源

    Yong.Teng
